EtheremonTrade.getBackLendingItem (/unique_chucks/1/0x4ba72f0f8dad13709ee28a992869e79d0fe47030.sol#588-605) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- item.releaseTime > block.timestamp (/unique_chucks/1/0x4ba72f0f8dad13709ee28a992869e79d0fe47030.sol#595-597)

EtheremonTrade.isOnTrading (/unique_chucks/1/0x4ba72f0f8dad13709ee28a992869e79d0fe47030.sol) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- (sellingDict[_objId].price > 0 || borrowingDict[_objId].owner != address(0)) (/unique_chucks/1/0x4ba72f0f8dad13709ee28a992869e79d0fe47030.sol)
